chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Nature of Pain
chapters.info: Mistress of Novices, p. 64—The Aes Sedai who is in charge of training novices and Accepted in the White Tower. The post was held by Sheriam Bayanar of the Blue Ajah until a coup that deposed Siuan Sanche chased her out of the Tower. The post is now held by Silviana Brehon in Tar Valon and Tiana Noselle among the Aes Sedai who fled to Salidar and now hold the city of Tar Valon under siege. Another Mistress of Novices of the past was Seraille Bagand, who later became the Amyrlin Seat. See also Bayanar, Sheriam; Brehon, Silviana; Noselle, Tiana.
